J

jLpr - class com.printscript.lpr.jLpr.
jLpr provides an interface to LPD print servers running on network hosts and network connected printers.
jLpr() - Constructor for class com.printscript.lpr.jLpr
 

P

printFile(String, String, String) - Method in class com.printscript.lpr.jLpr
Print a file to a network host or printer
printFile(String, String, String, String) - Method in class com.printscript.lpr.jLpr
Print a file to a network host or printer

S

setPrintRaw(boolean) - Method in class com.printscript.lpr.jLpr
By default jLpr prints all files as raw binary data, if you need to use the text formatting of the spooler on your host set this value to false
setUseOutOfBoundPorts(boolean) - Method in class com.printscript.lpr.jLpr
The RFC for lpr specifies the use of local ports numbered 721 - 731, however TCP/IP also requires that any port that is used will not be released for 3 minutes which means that jLpr will get stuck on the 12th job if prints are sent quickly.
